thread.title: A new chapter? Stephanie Davis finally follows Jeremy McConnell BACK on Twitter - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: A new chapter? Stephanie Davis finally follows Jeremy McConnell BACK on Twitter - Mirror Online

author: James Draper
title: A new chapter? Stephanie Davis finally follows Jeremy McConnell BACK on Twitter - Mirror Online
text:
A new chapter? Stephanie Davis finally follows Jeremy McConnell BACK on Twitter It looks like the Irish hunk and his ex-girlfriend might have finally kissed and made up Share Stephanie Davis has followed ex Jeremy McConnell back on Twitter Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
He recently extended an olive branch via micro-blogging site Twitter. And, clearly, it was appreciated - because Stephanie Davis has followed Jeremy McConnell back. 
The new mum, who rose to fame in Hollyoaks, made the public gesture on Sunday afternoon in what appears to be a welcome reconciliation between the pair. 
It comes just just days after Jez finally accepted his paternity with newborn son Caben. 
The Mirror have contacted representatives for both parties to clarify the significance of this development, but are yet to receive a response. Read More Made up? Jeremy McConnell follows Stephanie Davis on Twitter after acknowledging he's the father of her baby Stephanie has accepted Jeremy's friendship, which could signify a new chapter in their relationship (Photo: Twiiter) 
Jeremy - who denied paternity since Stephanie announced she was pregnant - shared an image of baby Caben-Albi George Davis for the first time, earlier this weekend. 
Jez posted an adorable picture of his son alongside the message: "Happiest man alive, my new focus". 
He also recently admitted that if he is the dad, he will be prepared to work together with Steph for the sake of their son. The tattooed hunk met the former Hollyoaks actress last year when they both took part in Celebrity Big Brother . 
They fell in love and continued dating on the outside world until things turned sour a few months later. Read More Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell met in CBB last year (Photo: Stephanie Davis / Twitter) 
Steph soon found out she was pregnant and at the time, Jeremy said it wasn't true. 
He then denied the baby was his when it became obvious she was expecting, and said he wanted a paternity test. 
Jeremy was seen on This Morning earlier this week having a DNA sample taken, but it is unknown if the test was carried out or what the results were. 
However, it seems like Jeremy is making it clear that he is the father and that little Caben will be part of his life. Jeremy shared this picture of Caben-Albi 
It comes after Stephanie Davis deleted any trace of the statement she put out after her ex, Jeremy McConnell, took swabs for a DNA test on live TV. 
Following the This Morning segment on Thursday, during which Jeremy opened up about not being there for Steph throughout her pregnancy, the ex-Hollyoaks star had tweeted a statement about Jez's treatment of her. 
She said she felt "humiliated" by the way in which Jeremy demanded to know whether he was the father of her newborn baby, Caben-Albi, and said he had ruined her pregnancy. Read More
